--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Scavenger::
> 
> Scavenger looks around at the other Constructicons, a bit uncertain. 
"Are you sure that's a good idea, Scrapper? He'd wanna kill us."
> 

    ::LONG HAUL::

    Long Haul looked uncertainly between his new leader and his fellow 
constructicons. 
    "I agree with both of you" he said. "To tick off Havotron would be 
a BAD thing but.....he's screwed us over one too many times. Ivote 
switching to Megatron." He sighed, staring at his feet. "I don't say 
that without a lot of concern and fear on my part. It could lead to a 
...needlessly violent affair." 

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
